name: part_004
file: tmp_【 #百鬼あやめ7周年新衣装3D 】百鬼あやめ７周年記念ライブ  ～天女繚華～ 【百鬼あやめ⧸ホロライブ】 [uRa-uLMea7w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Nakiri Ayame performs 'Gokuraku Jodo' in her 7th-anniversary 3D outfit with masked backup dancers.
A transition sequence with cherry blossom petals falling and the 7th-anniversary logo.
Usada Pekora makes her entrance inside a giant blue drop that pops open on stage.
Nakiri Ayame and Usada Pekora perform 'Kekkon Tsukkyun' together.

subtitles.original: 極楽浄土
subtitles.english: Gokuraku Jodo

subtitles.original: 月明かり昇る刻
subtitles.english: When the moonlight rises

subtitles.original: 灯る赤提灯
subtitles.english: Red lanterns light up

subtitles.original: 祭囃子の合図
subtitles.english: The signal of the festival music

subtitles.original: ふわり蝶が誘い出す
subtitles.english: A butterfly lightly lures you out

subtitles.original: ちょいと覗いて見てごらん
subtitles.english: Take a little peek and see

subtitles.original: 迷い込めば抜け出せない
subtitles.english: Once you wander in, you can't get out

subtitles.original: 楽しいことがしたいなら
subtitles.english: If you want to do something fun

subtitles.original: おいでませ極楽浄土
subtitles.english: Welcome to the Paradise Pure Land

subtitles.original: 歌えや歌え心のままに
subtitles.english: Sing, oh sing, just as your heart desires

subtitles.original: アナタの声をさあ聞かせて
subtitles.english: Come on, let me hear your voice

subtitles.original: 踊れや踊れ時を忘れ
subtitles.english: Dance, oh dance, forgetting time

subtitles.original: 今宵共にあー狂い咲き
subtitles.english: Tonight, together, ah, let's bloom crazily

subtitles.original: 美しく咲く花も
subtitles.english: Even the flowers that bloom beautifully

subtitles.original: いつか散りゆくもの
subtitles.english: Will eventually scatter and fade away

subtitles.original: それならこの一夜を
subtitles.english: If that's the case, this one night

subtitles.original: もっと熱く愛したい
subtitles.english: I want to love more passionately

subtitles.english: Let's do something "good"

subtitles.original: これは夢か幻か

subtitles.english: A world where there's neither lie nor truth

subtitles.original: 許婚っきゅん
subtitles.english: Kekkon Tsukkyun

subtitles.original: どいつもこいつもなんだかやっぱノー天気
subtitles.english: Everyone and their brother is just so carefree after all

subtitles.original: 気になるアンタの悩みもきっとあるでしょ
subtitles.english: You must have some worries on your mind too, right?

subtitles.original: 雑多で半端な憂鬱も群れおなじ
subtitles.english: All those messy, half-baked blues are just like the crowd

subtitles.original: アンタの頭の中はグチャグチャさ
subtitles.english: Your head is just a total mess

subtitles.original: ドンマイ弊害意気地ない魔法的意識
subtitles.english: Don't mind, the drawbacks, the spineless magical consciousness

subtitles.original: いけないいけない事柄なんて無いから
subtitles.english: Because there's no such thing as "bad" or "forbidden" things

subtitles.original: イーアルサンスーじゃんけんぽんでさあゆき
subtitles.english: One, two, three, rock-paper-scissors, let's go!

subtitles.original: ウーリュウチーパクーで天に召されてく
subtitles.english: Five, six, seven, eight, nine, being summoned to heaven

subtitles.original: キミは
subtitles.english: You are

subtitles.original: もうハイスピードだありゃまこりゃまお待ちかね
subtitles.english: Already at high speed, oh my, oh dear, just as you've been waiting for

subtitles.original: ハチャでメチャなドラマ
subtitles.english: A wild and crazy drama

subtitles.original: 派手にドラが鳴るよ
subtitles.english: The gong will ring out loudly

subtitles.original: いーいの？　ズキュン　I love you　なのな
subtitles.english: Is it okay? Zukyun! I love you!

subtitles.original: 四六時中愛をちょーだい
subtitles.english: Give me love 24/7

subtitles.original: はて？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: いーいじゃん！　バキュン　愛愛愛なのな
subtitles.english: It's fine! Bakyun! Love, love, love!

subtitles.original: 宇宙に１／２じゃもったいない
subtitles.english: 1/2 in the universe is just a waste
